publication.abstract: Â© The Author 2015. Published by Oxford University Press. Summary: We present Rust-Bio, the first general purpose bioinformatics library for the innovative Rust programming language. Rust-Bio leverages the unique combination of speed, memory safety and high-level syntax offered by Rust to provide a fast and safe set of bioinformatics algorithms and data structures with a focus on sequence analysis.
publication.title: Rust-Bio: A fast and safe bioinformatics library

summary.description: This library makes many algorithms and data structures that are useful for bioinformatics available for the Rust language.
summary.name: Rust-Bio
